price: Y a Zacarías, Juan, Jesús y Elías; todos ellos se contaron entre los piadosos.
arabic: وَزَكَرِيَّا وَيَحۡيَىٰ وَعِيسَىٰ وَإِلۡيَاسَۖ كُلّٞ مِّنَ ٱلصَّٰلِحِينَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: wazakariyyā wayaḥyā waʿīsā wa-il'yāsa kullun mina al-ṣāliḥīna
